definition: a representation of a person or scene in the form of a print or transparent slide, record on photographic film
details:
noun
- a representation of a person or scene in the form of a print or transparent slide
= synonyms: exposure
verb
- record on photographic film
= example: record on photographic film
= synonyms: snap
- undergo being photographed in a certain way
= example: undergo being photographed in a certain way
